thread.section_title: Hotel Panache - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Not what we expected
thread.title_full: Not what we expected - Review of Hotel Panache, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Mariska O
title: Not what we expected
text: In my opinion you pay way to much for the rooms. They're super small and not worth the price. The staff was really rude to us when we asked them about parking options. I even talked to him in French, but the guy was so unfriendly.. Also after the first day we had some inconvenients in our room and the reception told us to fix it, they did not. Never again !
